name: Silver Down
text: Give to the Norrin Radd player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: . Exhaust Norrin Radd → remove Silver Down from the game. . Summon Dawn Greenwood and remove her from the game → remove Silver Down from the game.

name: Galactus
text: Villainous. When Revealed: Reveal The World Eater and put it into play engaged with you. When Defeated: Remove Galactus from the game. (Silver Surfer's nemesis minion.)

flavor: “You will claim no victory here today, Norrin Radd. True, you may delay me for a time, but you cannot possibly stop me.”
name: The World Eater
text: Galactus cannot take damage and his attacks gain overkill. When Defeated: Remove The World Eater from the game.

flavor: Galactus is using The Power Cosmic to steal the heroes' life force!
name: The Life Stealer
text: All friendly characters get -1 ATK. When Revealed: Place 1 additional threat here for each friendly character in play.

flavor: “The only power you possess, is the power I bestowed upon you.”
name: Cosmic Power
text: Attach to Galactus. If you cannot, attach to the villain. [star] Attached enemy's attacks gain overkill. Hero Action: Take 3 damage → remove Cosmic Power from the game.
